mapper.select: /* selectTableSpace 쿼리 */ SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME FROM DBA_TABLESPACES

/* selectDbTablespaceChart */ SELECT b.tablespace_name AS tablespaceName , b.MAXBYTES / 1024 AS maxbytes , b.bytes / 1024 AS bytes , ((b.bytes - SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)))) / 1024 AS userBytes , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)) / (b.bytes)) * 100, 3) AS freePer , TRUNC((((b.bytes - SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)))) / 1024) / (b.bytes / 1024) * 100, 3) AS userPer , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(b.USER_BYTES,0)) / b.MAXBYTES) * 100, 3) AS userPerTot , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(b.BYTES,0)) / b.MAXBYTES) * 100, 3) AS bytePerTot FROM DBA_FREE_SPACE a , DBA_DATA_FILES b WHERE a.file_id(+) = b.file_id
GROUP BY b.tablespace_name , b.file_name , b.bytes , b.MAXBYTES ORDER BY b.tablespace_name

/* selectDbTablespaceChart */ SELECT b.tablespace_name AS tablespaceName , b.MAXBYTES / 1024 AS maxbytes , b.bytes / 1024 AS bytes , ((b.bytes - SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)))) / 1024 AS userBytes , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)) / (b.bytes)) * 100, 3) AS freePer , TRUNC((((b.bytes - SUM(NVL(a.bytes,0)))) / 1024) / (b.bytes / 1024) * 100, 3) AS userPer , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(b.USER_BYTES,0)) / b.MAXBYTES) * 100, 3) AS userPerTot , TRUNC((SUM(NVL(b.BYTES,0)) / b.MAXBYTES) * 100, 3) AS bytesPerTot FROM DBA_FREE_SPACE a , DBA_DATA_FILES b WHERE a.file_id(+) = b.file_id
GROUP BY b.tablespace_name , b.file_name , b.bytes , b.MAXBYTES ORDER BY b.tablespace_name

/* selectDbUsers 쿼리 */ SELECT USERNAME
FROM DBA_USERS WHERE DEFAULT_TABLESPACE = #{tablespaceName}

/* selectObjList 쿼리 */
SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME AS tablespaceName , SEGMENT_TYPE AS segmentType , COUNT(SEGMENT_TYPE) AS objCnt FROM DBA_SEGMENTS WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME = #{tablespaceName} GROUP BY SEGMENT_TYPE, TABLESPACE_NAME
